moves.name: Status Shield
moves.effect: Applies the Status Move Defense effect to the allied field of play.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Real Nice!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stat rank. Raises the user’s accuracy by 2 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: New Beginning Dragon Impact
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is flinching.

passives.name: Terrify 1
passives.description: Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user enters a battle.

passives.name: Mad Strength 9
passives.description: Raises the user’s Attack by one stat rank when one of its attack moves is successful.

passives.name: Aggravation 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.

grid.bonus: Dragon Claw:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Claw:Harry 2- Powers up the user’s moves when the move’s target or targets are flinching.
Status Shield:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Status Shield:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Dragon Rush:Move Gauge Refresh 1- Has a chance (20%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Rush:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Real Nice!:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Real Nice!:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Superduper Effective 2- Powers up moves that are super effective.
Critical Strike 2- Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.
Terrify 1- Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user enters a battle.
First Aid 4- Restores the user’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.
Harry 3- Powers up the user’s moves when the move’s target or targets are flinching.
Critastrophe 2- Powers up the user’s sync moves when they become critical hits.
Double Down 2- Powers up sync moves that are super effective.
Power Posture- The more the target’s Attack is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
